text_elements.typography_notes: The script font is decorative but remains legible.

symbol.description: Fork and knife integrated into the lettering

color_palette.contrast_notes: The red color stands out well against a white background.

layout.balance_notes: The logo is well-balanced with text and symbol integration.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate spacing between elements ensures readability.

issues.description: Script font may be hard to read at small sizes.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a simpler font for smaller applications.

trend_alignment.notes: Aligns with current trends favoring handcrafted and vintage aesthetics.
